20.0
-26.0
26.0
100.0
1.0
1.0
results.txt
#The above parameters are interpreted by wave1d as (in this specific order):
# c        wave speed
# tau      damping time
# x1       left most x value
# x2       right most x value
# runtime  how long to simulate
# dx       spatial grid size
# outtime  how often to output a snapshot
# filename name of the file for saving the data generated by the code
